name: Y and the Wizard
description:
'Y and the Wizard' is an interactive phonics lesson that explains the many sounds that the letter Y can make. It is appropriate for learners who already know the alphabet and are beginning to read and spell words.

Better Together: Many of my other phonics games are designed to be playable by young learners independently. 'Y and the Wizard' is intended as a shared experience best enjoyed by a child with support from a parent or teacher.
